description.raw:
This is the first part of the improvements to CI information from jenkins to bitbucket.

1. Merge `_bitbucket_create_build_status_file.bash` and `_bitbucket_set_status.bash` into one job to be able to call it multiple times with differents URL and descriptions.

 * Testing the new set_status_job: http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_bitbucket-set_status_ng/4/
 * Testing the whole pipeline: http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any/20/

Future pull request (to be sent):

2. Modify URLS sent to bitbucket. Change ci-pr_any by -ci-pr_any-$arch for inprogress and -ci-pr_any-$arch/$build_num for final result.

3. Add brew and windows jobs to the pipeline with the same scheme than in 2.
